91642.「お気に召されませんか アンルシア？: What's wrong? Don't you like it, Anlucia?

91643.「いいえ とんでもありません……！\n その……とても お似合いです。:
Oh...! No, I do. It's just...
It suits you very well.

91644.「そう言っていただけて 光栄です。 \n どうか これを……。:
I am honored to hear you say so.
Now, please accept this...

91646.「…………さまが こんなに …………なんて\n きっと …………ね！:
I can't believe that you're...
isn't this....?

91648.「ようこそ 六種族の祭典へ！\n 来てくれて 本当に うれしいわ。:
Welcome to the Festival of the Six Races!
I'm so glad that you could come.

91649.「<pc>は 各地で活躍してるから \n 忙しくて 来られなかったら\n どうし:
You're always traveling to many places,
so I was worried you would be too busy to
come...

91650.「相変わらず せわしない様子ですね\n ……<pc>。:
You seem as busy as ever,
<pc>...

91653.「あっ それはそうと……今 大広間で開催中の\n アストルティア八王会議が 白熱:
Ah, by the way... the Six Kings of Astoltia
Conference is being held in the Great Hall,
and it's getting quite heated.

91654.「舞踏会まで まだ時間があるみたいなの。\n 申し訳ないけれど 少しだけ\n 船:
It seems we still have some time before
the ball. I hope you don't mind
staying on the ship for a while longer?

91655.「あなたのために この船の２階にある\n 特等室を 押さえておいたわ！\n そこ:
I reserved a special room on the second level
of the ship just for you! The maid there will
show you around.

91656.「それじゃあ 私は準備があるから……。\n ふふっ また後でねっ！:
Okay then, I've got to get ready myself...
See you later!

91658.「こんなとこで昼寝なんて のんきだなぁ。\n ……しかも まだ寝ぼけてるでしょ？:
Look at you being so carefree, taking a nap
here. You're still sleepy, aren't you?

91659.「じつの弟である おいらの\n 名前や姿も 忘れちゃってたりして。:
Don't tell me you've forgotten the name and
face of your little brother.

91702.「あの 大丈夫でございましょうか……？ \n ひどく うなされておられた\n ご:
Are you okay...? It looks like you were having
a terrible nightmare...

91703.「ああ そうでした！\n 舞踏会の準備が ととのったようでございます。:
Oh, that's right! It seems that the
preparations for the ball have finished.

91704.「会場は 大広間となっております。\n この部屋をでて まっすぐ進んだところにあ:
It's being held in the Great Hall. You can get
there from the door straight across from this
room.

91705.「よろしければ ぜひ アンルシアさまが\n この部屋のタンスに 用意された衣装を:
If you'd like, you can wear one of the outfits
that Lady Anlucia has prepared for you in
that wardrobe over there.

91706.「アンルシアさまは <pc>さまとの \n 舞踏会を 心待ちにしておられましたの:
Lady Anlucia has really been looking forward
to going to the ball with you. Please have
fun and enjoy yourselves.

91708.「六種族の祭典へ よくぞ 来てくれた！\n 今宵は 大いに盛りあがろうぞ！:
Welcome to the Festival of the Six Races!
Let us enjoy ourselves this fine evening!

91709.「アンルシアも そなたと舞踏会に出られる日を\n 指折り数えては 楽しみにしてお:
Anlucia has been very much looking forward to
this day to attend the ball with you.

91710.「今宵の祭典には アストルティアの\n あまねく王を 招いておるのだ……。:
Tonight's celebration is open to all of
the kings of Astoltia...

91711.「ひゃっほう！ アリオス王 よい宴じゃの！\n ワシ 大満足じゃもん！:
Hyaha! What a feast this is, eh Arios?
I can't get enough of it!

91712.「これは ムーニス王！ ご機嫌な ご様子で。:
Ah, if it isn't Moonis! You seem to be in
high spirits.

91713.「むむっ そなた……\n わが命の恩人 <pc>！:
Ahh, it's you, <pc>...
The one who saved my life!

91714.「ずるいぞ アリオス王！ \n ワシだって <pc>と\n つもりつもった思い出:
Hey, no fair! I want to reminisce with
<pc> about our great times
together too!

91715.「まあ そう あせらずに ムーニス王。 \n <pc>は 今宵の宴の\n もうひ:
Now, now, Moonis. <pc> is
the other special guest of honor for
tonight's festivities, after all.

91716.「舞踏会が始まるまで まだ時間もある。 \n よい機会だから 勇者の盟友として\:
There's still some time before the ball will start. I think it's a good chance to introduce yourself to the other kings as the Hero's
ally. Don't you agree?

91717.「そうじゃ そうじゃ 賛成じゃよ！\n <pc>！ ワシ 待っておるから！:
Yes, yes! That's a splendid idea!
I'll be waiting for you, <pc>!

91718.「すべての王に あいさつし終わったようだな。\n まこと ご苦労であった！:
I see you've finished greeting all the other
kings. Thank you very much, indeed!

91719.「……そなたが 王たちと語らう姿を見ながら \n ここまで どれほどの旅を 続け:
As I watched you talk with all of the kings,
I just think of how far you've traveled to
be where you are now...

91720.「さあ いよいよ 舞踏会の幕をあげようぞ！:
...Now then, at last! Let the ball finally
begin!

91721.「…………うむ。\n トーマにも 見せてやりたかったな。: I wish Toma were here to see this...

91722.「さあさ <pc>。\n 次は あなたが踊ってあげてください。:
Come, <pc>. Now it's your turn
to dance with her.

91723.<if_woman><center>できれば 会いたくなかったよ……姉ちゃん。<: <if_woman>I didn't want to see you like this... sister.<else>I didn't want to see you like this...brother.<endif>

91730.「ふむ……。 \n さらわれたのは アンルシア姫と\n ラグアス王子か……。:
Hmm... So both Princess Anlucia
and Prince Raguas were kidnapped...

91731.「この舞踏会を襲ってくるとは 不敵な奴め。 \n 賊の狙いは 我ら王族に ちがい:
How bold of them to attack this ball... they
must be after those of royal blood.

91732.「アンルシア姫と ラグアス王子……。\n もしや……若き王族が 狙われたのか？\:
Anlucia and Raguas... what if... it's the
younger royalty they're after? You know,
those with the future of Astoltia.

91734.<center>できれば 会いたくなかったぜ……<pc>。:
I didn't want to see you like this...
<pc>.

91735.<center>できれば 会いたくなかったわ……<pc>。:
I didn't want to see you like this...
<pc>.

91736.<if_woman><center>できれば 会いたくなかったよ……お姉ちゃん。: I didn't want to see you like this...

91740.「<pc>……これは 災いの始まりです。:
This could spell the beginning of a
disaster...

91741.「私が あの場にいながら みすみす \n 勇者を さらわれてしまうとは くち惜し:
I'm ashamed that I let the Hero get taken away
while I was there.

91742.「記念すべき祭典の席で 客人たちを驚かせまいと \n 人の姿に変化したことが ア:
I changed into human form to avoid startling
any of the guests.

91743.「……もう お気づきでしょう？\n 私の本当の名は ファルシオン……\n あなた:
I'm sure you've already figured it out... my
real name is Falchion. The Pegasus you
know so well.

91744.「この姿の私では 本来のチカラを発揮できず\n ペガサスに戻るための 唯一のカギ:
I'm unable to use my full power in this form,
and Anlucia took with her the only way for
me to change back...

91745.「私が 信頼の証として 彼女に\n ペンダントを渡していたのを 覚えていますか？:
You remember that pendant I gave to her?
That's my only way of changing back.

91746.「しかし 突如現われた あの人物……\n もしかして あなたも見覚えがあるのでは:
That person who appeared at the ball... You
know who they are too, don't you...?

91747.「やはり <kyodai>なのですね。:
I knew it. It was <kyodai>,
wasn't it...

91748.「私が エテーネの村で カメさまとして \n あなたたち兄弟を 見守っていた頃の:
It's just as when I was the Galapagod in the
village, watching over you and your sibling...

91749.「あの子は あなたのチカラで\n 遠い時代へ 飛ばされたはずでしたが……:
They were supposed to have been transported
into the distant past by your power, but...

91750.「……いや しかし あの子もまた\n エテーネの血を 引く者か。:
No... they too have the blood of Ethene in
their veins.

91751.「取り込み中に すまない……。 \n <pc>に 火急の用件がある。:
I'm sorry for the interruption... but I must
speak to <pc> about an urgent
matter.

91752.「この船が グランゼドーラ港に戻ったら\n すぐ ヴェリナード城まで来てほしいの:
Please come to Verinard Castle as soon as the
ship returns to the harbor.

91753.「アンルシア姫たちが さらわれた時 \n あの賊は あと ４人と言っていた……。:
When Anlucia and Raguas were captured, the
kidnapper said "just four more"... they may
still be planning something!

91754.「そして 若き王族が 狙われたのならば\n 次に さらわれる可能性があるのは……:
And if the young royalty really are being
targeted, then...

91755.「……オーディス王子も\n 候補者のひとり……というわけですね。:
Prince Odis would also be one of those
targets...

91756.「<pc> 行くべきです。\n もしかしたら <kyodai>の足取りも\n つ:
You should go, <pc>. You may
find more clues about <kyodai>.

91757.「世界に 異変が起きようとしている 今\n あなたに 希望を託しましょう。:
Great change is upon this world... and we
entrust our hope to you.

98741.「こんなとこで昼寝なんて のんきだな。\n ……しかも まだ寝ぼけてるだろ？:
You're so carefree, taking a nap here...
You're still sleepy, aren't you...?

98742.「こんなとこで昼寝なんて のんきねぇ。\n ……しかも まだ寝ぼけてるんじゃない:
You're so carefree, taking a nap here...
You're still sleepy, aren't you...?

98743.「こんなとこで昼寝なんて のんきだね。\n ……しかも まだ寝ぼけてるでしょ？:
You're so carefree, taking a nap here...
You're still sleepy, aren't you...?

98744.「じつの兄である オレの\n 名前や姿も 忘れちまってたりして。:
Don't tell me you've forgotten the name and
face of your own brother.

98745.「じつの姉である あたしの\n 名前や姿も 忘れちゃってたり？:
Don't tell me you've forgotten the name and
face of your own sister.

98746.「じつの妹である 私の\n 名前や姿も 忘れちゃってたりして。:
Don't tell me you've forgotten the name and
face of your own little sister.

98751.<if_woman>「忘れられてたら どうしようかと思ったけど\n やっぱり 姉:
I was afraid that you'd forgotten me... but
you'll always be my <if_woman>sister<else>brother<end>, no matter what!

98752.<if_woman>「……この村で 姉ちゃんと過ごした時間は\n 本当に かけが:
The time we spent here together was truly
irreplaceable...

98753.<if_woman>「あの日 姉ちゃんと別れて\n ずっと昔の時代に 飛ばされて:
Since I left you behind that day and was
transported far into the past... a lot of
things happened.

98754.「そう……いろんなことがね。 \n それから おいら\n 何度も何度も 考えちゃ:
Yes... all sorts of things. I think about them
over and over again...

98755.<if_woman>「おいらが あんなつらい思いをしたのは\n 全部 姉ちゃんの:
It was then I realized that all of the pain
that I had to go through... it was your fault.

98759.<if_woman>「忘れられてたら どうしようかと思ったけど\n やっぱり <:
I was afraid that you'd forgotten me, but
you'll always be my little <if_woman>sis<else>bro<end>! Always!

98760.<if_woman>「忘れられてたら どうしようかと思ったけど\n やっぱり <:
<if_woman>I was afraid you'd forgotten me, but
you will always be my
little sister!<else>I was afraid you'd forgotten me, but
you will always be my little brother!<endif>

98761.<if_woman>「忘れられてたら どうしようかと思ったけど\n やっぱり お:
<if_woman>I was afraid you'd forgotten me, but
you will always be my big sister!<else>I was afraid you'd forgotten me, but
you will always be my big brother!<endif>

98762.「……この村で お前と過ごした時間は\n 本当に かけがえのないもんだったな。:
The time I spent with you in this village
was truly irreplaceable.

98763.「……この村で あんたと過ごした時間は\n 本当に かけがえのないものだったわ。:
The time I spent with you in this village
was truly irreplaceable.

98764.<if_woman>「……この村で お姉ちゃんと過ごした時間は\n 本当に かけ:
<if_woman>The time I spent with you in this village
was truly irreplaceable.<else>The time I spent with you in this village
was truly irreplaceable.<endif>

98765.「あの日 <pc>と別れて\n ずっと昔の時代に 飛ばされてから……\n いろん:
Since I left you behind that day and was
transported far into the past... a lot of
things happened.

98766.「あの日 <pc>と別れて\n ずっと昔の時代に 飛ばされてから……\n いろん:
Since I left you behind that day and was
transported far into the past... a lot of
things happened.

98767.<if_woman>「あの日 お姉ちゃんと別れて\n ずっと昔の時代に 飛ばされ:
Since I left you behind that day and was
transported far into the past... a lot of
things happened.

98768.「そう……いろんなことがな。\n それから オレ\n 何度も何度も 考えちまうん:
That's right... so many things. And I keep
thinking about them over and over again.

98769.「そう……いろんなことがね。\n それから あたし\n 何度も何度も 考えちゃう:
That's right... so many things. And I keep
thinking about them over and over again.

98770.「そう……いろんなことが。\n それから 私\n 何度も何度も 考えちゃうの。:
That's right... so many things. And I keep
thinking about them over and over again.

98771.「オレが あんなつらい思いをしたのは\n 全部 お前のせいなんじゃないか……って:
I realized it's all your fault
that I had to go through such pain...

98772.「あたしが あんなつらい思いをしたのは\n 全部 あんたのせいなんじゃないか……:
I realized it's all your fault
that I had to go through such pain...

98773.<if_woman>「私が あんなつらい思いをしたのは\n 全部 お姉ちゃんのせ:
I realized it's all your fault that I had to
go through such pain...

103404.「<pc>……。\n 甲板の 船尾楼で待っています。:
I'll be waiting for you outside on the deck,
<pc>...

119342.「……<pc>。\n ふたたび 旅立ちの時が来ました。:
...<pc>.
Once again, the time has come to depart.
